com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g2d.graphics

Class AtlasAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g2d.graphics.AtlasAnimation

  • public class AtlasAnimation
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates and stores an Animation based on a TextureAtlas.
    Author:
    David Jerzak (RivelBop)

    • Constructor Detail

      • AtlasAnimation

        public AtlasAnimation(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureAtlas atlas,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      float frameDelay,
                      com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation.PlayMode playMode)
        Creates an AtlasAnimation object by providing each aspect of an animation.
        Parameters:
        atlas - The texture atlas file used by the animation.
        name - The name of the region from the provided atlas file.
        frameDelay - The amount of time each frame will be displayed.
        playMode - The 'loop type' of the animation.

      • AtlasAnimation

        public AtlasAnimation(com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureAtlas.AtlasRegion> frames,
                      float frameDelay,
                      com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation.PlayMode playMode)
        Creates an AtlasAnimation object by providing each aspect of an animation.
        Parameters:
        frames - The frames of animation to loop through.
        frameDelay - The amount of time each frame will be displayed.
        playMode - The 'loop type' of the animation.

      • update

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureAtlas.AtlasRegion update(float animationTime)
        Updates and returns the frames of the animation based on an external animation timer.
        Parameters:
        animationTime - An external timer to use for calculating animation frames.
        Returns:
        The animation frame based on the provided timer.
